Entries.DialogueText: Bumped into Robin this morning... she told me you've got a new Slime Hutch!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bumped into Robin this morning... she told me you've got a new Slime Hutch!

Entries.DialogueText: Not bad!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not bad!

Entries.DialogueText: I was into slime breeding at your age. It's a great hobby... but dangerous.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was into slime breeding at your age. It's a great hobby... but dangerous.

Entries.DialogueText: How'd you think I lost this eye?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How'd you think I lost this eye?

Entries.DialogueText: Hah!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Just Kidding.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just Kidding.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I've got something for you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I've got something for you.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a slime egg. You can place that inside a slime incubator to hatch it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a slime egg. You can that inside a slime incubator to hatch it.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, take a good hard look at that egg. Next time you're out slime-hunting keep your eyes peeled for more eggs. They're rare, but slimes do drop them from time to time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, take a good hard look at that egg. Next you're out slime-hunting keep your eyes peeled for more eggs. They're rare, but slimes do drop them from to .

Entries.DialogueText: Collect eggs from different slimes to add some variety to your herd!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Collect eggs from different slimes to add some variety to your herd!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm...

Entries.DialogueText: ...I was just peering down into this old mine shaft.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I was just peering down into this old mine shaft.

Entries.DialogueText: It's been abandoned for decades.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been aoned for decades.

Entries.DialogueText: Still, there's probably good ore down there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Still, there's probably good ore down there.

Entries.DialogueText: But a dark place, undisturbed for so long... I'm afraid ore isn't the only thing you'll find...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But a dark , undisturbed for so long... I'm afraid ore isn't the only thing you'll find...

Entries.DialogueText: Here, take this. You might need it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, take this. You might need it.

Entries.DialogueText: Name's Marlon, by the way. I run the adventurer's guild right outside.
Entries.DisplayPattern: 's Marlon, by the way. I run the adventurer's guild right outside.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll keep my eye on you. Prove yourself and I might think about making you a member.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll keep my eye on you. Prove yourself and I might think about making you a member.

Entries.DialogueText: 克林特的剑一年比一年锋利。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 克林特的剑一年比一年锋利。

Entries.DialogueText: 他的价格也是这样……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 他的价格也是这样......

Entries.DialogueText: 我想买一把新武器，要不要跟克林特谈一笔生意呢……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我想买一把新武器,要不要跟克林特谈一笔生意呢......

Entries.DialogueText: 不要太靠近笼子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不要太靠近笼子。

Entries.DialogueText: 我今年抓到了更多怪物，注意离笼子远点。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我今年抓到了更多怪物,注意离笼子远点。

Entries.DialogueText: 哪怕我行动不方便，镇上的节日我也一次不落。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哪怕我行动不方便,镇上的节日我也一次不落。

Entries.DialogueText: 你抓到过史莱姆蛋吗？这就是真正的挑战了……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你抓到过史莱姆蛋吗?这就是真正的挑战了......

Entries.DialogueText: 玛妮今天好美呀……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 玛妮今天好美呀......

Entries.DialogueText: 唔，我好像看到有什么东西在水上掠过去了。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔,我好像看到有什么东西在水上掠过去了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我要待在树荫这里……这边气候凉爽多了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我要待在树荫这里......这边气候凉爽多了。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好。

Entries.DialogueText: 汤？跳舞？不用了，我待在这里就足够了，而且总得有人看着，万一冒出来什么怪物…… {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 汤?跳舞?不用了,我待在这里就足够了,而且总得有人看着,万一冒出来什么怪物......

Entries.DialogueText: 虽然我只有一只眼睛看得清，但是我跟你保证，那些暗中潜伏的猛兽我一个都不会漏看。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 虽然我只有一只眼睛看得清,但是我跟你保证,那些暗中潜伏的猛兽我一个都不会漏看。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨，下午好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨,下午好。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯？哦，你好。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯?哦,你好。

Entries.DialogueText: 不用管我，自己去玩吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不用管我,自己去玩吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨，下午好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨,下午好。

Entries.DialogueText: 冬天其实不算太糟糕，因为不会出现虫子……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 冬天其实不算太糟糕,因为不会出现虫子......

Entries.DialogueText: 今年你能超过威利吗？他很强……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今年你能超过威利吗?他很强......

Entries.DialogueText: 我还在准备中，请稍后再来。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我还在准备中,请稍后再来。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊，{Farmer_Name}。欢迎来到探险家公会挑战摊位。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊,。欢迎来到探险家公会挑战摊位。

Entries.DialogueText: 每天，我们会提供两个挑战供你选择。选择一个完成后，公会就会奖励你大量卡利科三花蛋。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 每天,我们会提供两个挑战供你选择。选择一个完成后,公会就会奖励你大量卡利科三花蛋。

Entries.DialogueText: 一旦你选定了挑战就无法再更改，一定要谨慎选择！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一旦你选定了挑战就无法再更改,一定要谨慎选择!

Entries.DialogueText: 怎么，想要测试你的勇气？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 怎么,想要测试你的勇气?

Entries.DialogueText: 我这有几个挑战可以满足你的要求。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我这有几个挑战可以满足你的要求。

Entries.DialogueText: 忍不住想要去探险了吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 忍不住想要去探险了吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 很好，今天的挑战在这里。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 很好,今天的挑战在这里。

Entries.DialogueText: 工欲善其事，必先利其器。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 工欲善其事,必先利其器。

Entries.DialogueText: 武器锋利了才能完成今天的挑战。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 武器锋利了才能完成今天的挑战。

Entries.DialogueText: 你眼中闪烁着勇气的光芒。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你眼中闪烁着勇气的光芒。

Entries.DialogueText: 要不要来一场挑战？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 要不要来一场挑战?

Entries.DialogueText: 还在努力完成挑战是吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 还在努力完成挑战是吧?

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯，给你提个醒，挑战内容是这个。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯,给你提个醒,挑战内容是这个。

Entries.DialogueText: 非常好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 非常好。

Entries.DialogueText: 明天还会有更多挑战，现在可以放松休息一下了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 明天还会有更多挑战,现在可以放松休息一下了。

Entries.DialogueText: 哇，你成功了！很了不起。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哇,你成功了!很了不起。

Entries.DialogueText: 今年的活动就到这里，我和吉尔下次还会来的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今年的活动就到这里,我和吉尔下次还会来的。

Entries.DialogueText: 他回来了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 他回来了!

Entries.DialogueText: 她回来了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 她回来了!

Entries.DialogueText: 是来买剑的吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 是来买剑的吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 吉尔，醒醒！有客人来了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 吉尔,醒醒!有客人来了。

Entries.DialogueText: 晚上好。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 晚上好。
